title: 1-year-old suffers fatal gunshot wound to the face
content:
Cleveland EMS confirms that a 1-year-old boy suffered a fatal gunshot wound to the face.
The incident happened Saturday afternoon in the 3700 block of E. 63 near Fleet Ave.
An EMS captain says the child was transported to MetroHealth Medical Center and was pronounced dead upon arrival.
No further information is available at this time.
Check back for more information as it becomes available.
